outline:
1. to encounter, meet, befall, happen, come to meet
    1. (Qal)
      1. to encounter, meet
      2. to befall
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to encounter, meet (without pre-arrangement)
      2. to chance to be present
      3. to come to meet
    3. (Hiphil) to cause to meet, appoint
  2. to build with beams
    1. (Piel) to lay the beams of, furnish with beams
kjv_def: appoint, lay (make) beams, befall, bring, come (to pass unto), floor, (hap) was, happen (unto), meet, send good speed.
strongs_def: to light upon (chiefly by accident); causatively, to bring about; specifically, to impose timbers (for roof or floor)
